blog.name: grifane
blog.title: Fantine
blog.description: @grifane on insta // 20 // giggling is 80% of my personality

tags: i know it's not realistic because marketing wise it would be a suicide
but i always was and will be curious
summary: I'd really like an hour long video of Dan and Phil being interviewed about phan. Not in a 'Oh MY goD ArE yOU GuYS TOgeThER ?'...
body:
I’d really like an hour long video of Dan and Phil being interviewed about phan. Not in a ‘Oh MY goD ArE yOU GuYS TOgeThER ?’ way.

I mean I’d like an actual interview on how the ship has affected their life, their friendship, how it was also a part of their fame.

I’d love to hear to what extent it was used and to what extent it was a bother ?

Like they said in an interview that they realized the first video they did together made more views than usual ones. And I really think that it set up a relationship that was as much friendship as it was a 'buisness’ thing.

The fandom it created around them was really hyped up by their interactions and the more there were, the more they got views and you gotta put bread on the table, especially in the early days.

If I were them i’d be terrified of breaking that link that made “Dan and Phil”

The brand is a lil Dan Howell and a lil amazingphil but from my perspective, a lot of it is phan.

It’s almost impossible to talk about one without talking about the other. (I know this is controversial, at least it was in 2016 when I was really IN the phandom)

So having their opinions on the subject would be really interesting

body:
I’m a dannie

Dan loves phil.

I love phil.

I love dan.

That means that I’m a dannie because dan loves phil and I love them both.

But wait-

Phil loves dan too.

I love dan.

SO that means that I’m a phillie because phil loves dan and I love them both.

But wait-

summary: does anyone else ever think about how dnp make incredibly niche references to each others videos all the time, like that time...
body: does anyone else ever think about how dnp make incredibly niche references to each others videos all the time, like that time they were playing golf with friends and phil was like ‘its the POWER OF TRIANGLES’ or how Dan vs. Phil - Mario Kart 8 came out 4 years ago but sometimes dan and phil still say ‘oH bLaMe ThE sPeEd’ in exactly the same tone as dan did that one (1) time? like we’re all out here trying to be dan and phil stans but the truth is that we’ll never stan dnp as much as they stan each other

blog.name: plyyeemoloser
blog.title: heyo, i'm [a slut for Remus]

summary: Would anyone be interested in a joining a discord for fandoms? It would be like multiple fandoms in one place. I'm not sure how...
body:
Would anyone be interested in a joining a discord for fandoms? It would be like multiple fandoms in one place. I’m not sure how I would control all the possible discourse, but it sounds like a good idea in my head.

If anyone has suggestions for fandoms to add (please include the fandom name/what individual fans are called) or ways to keep it safe, let me know.

Also interact with this post in some way to let me know that it’s an idea that interests you.

I’ll be tagging this post with fandoms I’m in, but it’s open to all fandoms (unless I have a personal vendetta against it, lol)

reblog.comment:

body:
howdy phannies

ok so i’ve done enough ~introduction posts~ in my lifetime that this is going to be simple and dumb. basically, i’ve been a phannie for going on 6 years and the boys are of course coming full circle and developing into a Hyperfixation™ again…. so i need somewhere to scream about them and their videos. thus this blog was born. pls follow me i need friends.

blog.description:
!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)
